title: מחפשים עבודה? 10 משרות טריות לאנשי פיתוח
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות למפתחים בחברות גדולות וקטנות שמגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות למפתחים בחברות גדולות וקטנות שמגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
מקור: Pixabay
לעובדים בתעשיית הסטארטאפים וההייטק יש דרישות מיוחדות ממקום העבודה שלהם. מעבר למשכורת מתגמלת, כולנו רוצים גם מקום עבודה שייתן משמעות וערך נוספים, אבל גם יאפשר לאזן בין עבודה לפנאי, ושסביבת העבודה תהיה מפרה ומעוררת השראה ושתעודד צמיחה, למידה ומקצועיות. איך מוצאים מקום כזה? בדיוק בשביל זה אנחנו כאן.
רוצים שגם המשרה או חברה שלכם תופיע כאן? הצטרפו עכשיו לפלטפורמת Geektime Insider. לפרטים נוספים

If you like to explore new technologies, to evaluate, design and implement new BigData platforms, you should join us!

– Experience in building large scale BigData systems, experience in evaluation, prototype, integration and performance tuning
– Experience with cloud platforms: AWS, GCP or Azure
Independent, self-learner with the ability and passion to learn new domains and technologies
– Familiarity with Hadoop ecosystem: HDFS/Hive/Hbase/PIG/ Spark – Advantage

You will be working on developing and applying deep learning and NLP algorithms. The ranges of problems include natural language interactions, cognitive computing, data mining, anomaly detection, classification and modeling. You will be working with other researchers from different labs in GRC and business units on identifying needs, sharing common solutions, and implementing solutions. Together you will define frameworks, and implement components for the efficient and scalable deployment of analytics in the industrial cloud.
Responsibilities:
– Carry out AI related research work
– Cooperate with other researchers in identifying needs, defining the research topics and the desired outcomes
– Introduce state of the art methods using deep learning, NLP, and cognitive computing to the lab
– Implement algorithms preferably in Python, Java, and C++ environments
– Collaborate with and coach other researchers in the lab
Requirements:
– Ph.D in computer science or related fields doing research in the fields of machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, NLP, cognitive computing
– 3+ years of experience in industrial or postdoc environment
– Good knowledge of the field, being up to date on the state of the art.
– Good analytical skills and original thinking
– Good system level understanding of problems
– Experience in implementing algorithms using Python, Java, C++
– Benefit – experience in implementing algorithms using GPU
– Benefit – experience in developing for cloud based solutions
– Independent and innovative with the ability to lead problem definition and goal definition processes
– Good communication skills
– Fluent in English

משרדי Riskified
Riskified’s Engine Team is seeking a tech savvy back-end web developer to take part in building a large scale automated decision engine for an eCommerce fraud detection system.
As a back-end developer you will be responsible for developing a system that translates models and rules into classifications of eCommerce orders, for automating processes of feature engineering, for model training, and additional adjustments.
Responsibilities:
– Work with the analytical teams to build and improve Riskified’s proprietary machine learning and predictive models’ subsystems
– Assess and adopt new available technologies
– Optimize the application for maximum speed and scalability while writing high quality, reusable and reliable code
– Design the overall architecture of the machine learning application
– Translate R research code to Ruby production code
– Use TDD to write well-tested code
– Fix bugs fast and improve application performance
Requirements:
– At least 3-5 years of recent hands-on coding and software design
– Proficient knowledge of a back-end programming language, preferably Ruby
– Someone who can plan and design the system from a high level perspective
– Autodidactic approach to software development, and ability to work on a wide range of development platforms
– Solid OOP and software design knowledge – you should know how to create software that’s extensible, reusable and meets desired architectural objectives
– Can handle Math/Statistics algorithms and transform them to workable code
– Highly data-driven, knowledge of SQL
